00021 require_once 'VMAuth.php';
00022 
00027 class VMAuthFile extends VMAuth {
00028 
00030         private $file;
00031         
00039         public function __construct($login="", $pass="", $context="default", $file="/etc/asterisk/voicemail.conf") {
00040                 $this->login   = $login;
00041                 $this->pass    = $pass;
00042                 $this->context = $context;
00043                 $this->file    = $file;
00044         }
00045 
00049         public function __destruct() {
00050                 
00051         }
00052 
00057         public function getContext() {
00058                 return $this->context;
00059         }
00060 
00065         public function setContext($context) {
00066                 $this->context = $context;
00067         }
00068 
00073         public function getLogin() {
00074                 return $this->login;
00075         }
00076 
00081         public function setLogin($login) {
00082                 $this->login = $login;
00083         }
00084         
00089         public function getPass() {
00090                 return $this->pass;
00091         }
00092         
00097         public function setPass($pass) {
00098                 $this->pass = $pass;
00099         }
00100 
00105         public function login() {
00106                 $fd = fopen($this->file, "r");
00107                 if( !$fd ) {
00108                         echo "<error>";
00109                         echo "Could not open the VOICEMAIL_CONF file : $VOICEMAIL_CONF\n"; 
00110                         echo "</error>\n";
00111                         return FALSE;
00112                 }
00113                 
00114                 $valid = FALSE;
00115                 $cont = "";
00116                 while( ! feof($fd) ) {
00117                         $buf = fgets($fd, 4096);
00118                         $line = trim($buf);
00120                         $pattern = '/^\[(.*)\]$/';
00121                         if( preg_match($pattern, $line, $matches) ) {
00122                                 $cont = $matches[1];
00123                         }
00125                         $pattern  = '/^\s*(\w+)\s*=>\s*(\d+),.*$/';
00126                         if( preg_match($pattern, $line, $matches) ) {
00127                                 if( $cont == $this->getContext() &&
00128                                         $matches[1] == $this->login &&
00129                                         $matches[2] == $this->pass ) {
00130                                         $valid = TRUE;
00131                                         fclose($fd);
00132                                         return $valid;
00133                                 }
00134                         }
00135                 }
00136                 fclose($fd);
00137                 return $valid;
00138         }
00139 
00144         public function logoff() {
00145                 return TRUE;
00146         }
00147 
00148 } // end of VMAuthFile
